title: Strengthening Customer Service Practical Competencies: Goal-Based Instructional Design Workshop for Early Childhood and Elementary Mathematics Education

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary Educational Theory and Understanding of Mathematical Concepts
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners will be able to design number concept formation activities for young children according to the backward design model
Learners will be able to design an integrated connection structure across elementary mathematics curricula using concept maps
Learners will iteratively improve instructional design prototypes using formative assessment tools
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
